name: A slippery adventure
description:
Hello young slime, welcome to "A slippery adventure"! I'm Oskar81, creator of the game and I'm here to give you some information...

This game tells the story of Elly who, together with her slime friend, have to figure out how to stop an evil creature, while you learn more about the different slimes that exist in this world.

Current status:

-Currently the game ends at the end of the prologue, but more content will be added in the future!

What the game will contain: 

-Inflation. 

-Expansion. 

-Perma-preg.

What may be in the game (specific times): 

-WG.

-Vore(only from slimes).

-Burps. 

- Breast expansion.

What will not be in the game:

-Vore. 

-Gore. 

-Lolicon. 

-Sexual content. 

We also have discord! the link is here:

https://discord.gg/NbUHnRED
